forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning then increasing clouds with some snow showers later in the day. Morning high of 9C with temps falling to 1 to 3. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early then becoming mostly cloudy with snow showers developing later in the day. Morning high of 51F with temps falling to near 35. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -2C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low around 30F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low near -5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low 24F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
